description: This Python script is a CLI utility for initializing various types of software projects based on user-provided configurations and templates. It uses argparse for command line argument parsing, handles project configuration creation, and outputs the initialization results in JSON format.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration holding project metadata such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration or class method to convert string project type identifiers to internal representations.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains initialization commands, environment configuration, and various setup scripts for project scaffolding.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for setting up and initializing the project structure based on configuration and templates.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriately typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments, including parsing parameters.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative file path to an absolute path based on a base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Transforms a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary suitable for JSON serialization, with absolute paths for init files.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Prints the JSON output structure indicating success/failure and including optional init info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main execution entry point that orchestrates argument parsing, project setup, and output generation.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
